attributes.additional_details: Because it’s not fair on all the people who struggle on minimum wage who aren’t on no where near as much money as these train workers and we can’t even get to work to earn the money
attributes.background: Stop the train strikes it’s coursing a lot of people to lose jobs and not being able to get to work to earn money

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620342
